CLNews 0.4.0¶

Contents:

shell¶

class clnews.shell.Command(name, description)¶

Abstract class implementing the shell commands.

It implements the basic functionality of the shell commands and serves as a parent class.

class clnews.shell.CommandGet(channel_name, channel_url)¶

Implements the .get command.

Derives from shell.Command class and implements the .get command

execute()¶

Executes the command.

Retrieves the events for the given channel.

Raises:
ShellCommandExecutionError: An error occured when the event retrieval fails.
class clnews.shell.CommandHelp¶

Implements the .help command.

Derives from shell.Command class and implements the .help command

execute()¶

Executes the command.

Puts in the buffer the output of the command

print_output()¶

Prints the output of the command

class clnews.shell.CommandList¶

Implements the .list command.

Derives from shell.Command class and implements the .list command

execute()¶

Executes the command.

Lists all the available channels.

class clnews.shell.Shell¶

Implements the shell functionality.

run()¶

Runs infinitely executing the commands given in input.

clnews.shell.less(func)¶

Less decorator.

Pipes the output of the decorated function into the less commans

news¶

class clnews.news.Channel(name, url)¶

Implements the Channel functionality.

get_events()¶

Retrieves the current events.

Raises:
ChannelRetrieveEventsError: An error occured while retrieving the events.
class clnews.news.Event(title, url, date, summary='')¶

Wraps up the data of an event.

exceptions¶

exception clnews.exception.ChannelDataNotFound¶

Is raised when no data is retrieved from feedparser.

exception clnews.exception.ChannelRetrieveEventsError¶

Is raised when an uncaught exception occurs during events’ retrieval.

exception clnews.exception.ChannelServerError¶

Is raised when feedparser returns a server error.

exception clnews.exception.EventAttrError¶

Is raised when a wrong attribute type is given in an Event initialization

exception clnews.exception.ShellCommandChannelNotFound¶

Is raised when events from an unknown channel are requested.

exception clnews.exception.ShellCommandDoesNotExist¶

Is raised when an unknown command is given in input prompt.

exception clnews.exception.ShellCommandExecutionError¶

IS raised when an error occurs while executing a command.

exception clnews.exception.ShellCommandOutputError¶

Is raised when output is not of the expected type.

exception clnews.exception.StackEmptyError¶

Is raised when a stack is empty
